text: <@U7ADCU3BM> Sorry, yes. I have a module that gives the end user the ability to choose which social media icons they would like, but I also need to give them the ability to upload the URL's to their accounts.
^ that is my current markup, I'm using boolean logic to achieve the first part of the module but I need some sort of HubL to acquire the users URL

oh I see, you can use the same logic as before. 
You can declare a text module to put the link there
{% text "link_linkedin" export_to_template_context=True %}

But actually if you are already using the beta designer you can create all those as fields
